{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of cavities filled in molars and y be the number of cavities filled in canines.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "20x + 15y \leq 3000",
        "3x + 2.3y \leq P",
        "y \geq 0.6(x+y)",
        "x \geq 45",
        "x, y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize P"
}
